credit_line: Gift of Mrs Calvin W. Stillman
title: Textile
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: strip-woven, stitched, printed an embroidered
description: Seven strips of white woven cotton, each about 12 inches wide, stitched together selvedge to selvedge with embroidered bands of blue, green, yellow, and red. The strips are stamp-printed in dark brown/black in a variety of geometric symbols.
name: Textile
